Description of incident: The Regional Income Tax Agency notified indivudals that it lost personal data when a DVD that contained copies of income tax documents went missing. "The agency stored DVD's off-site at a third party vendor's facility. The missing DVD was discovered when RITA recalles some DVDs to destroy them. The agency has moved to a new more secure backup system, making the DVDs obsolete, according to the agency."More information: http://www.cleveland.com/metro/index.ssf/2016/01/rita_loses_personal_inf...
